key_findings: Strong output: 9 CVs created in single session
Memory infrastructure exists but fragmented (4+ daily files for same day)
Git remote not configured - backups local only
Brave API key missing - web search blocked
No memory INDEX.md - stable facts scattered
risk_flags: Context compaction will lose daily fragments
No remote backup - data loss risk
Research capability blocked (Brave API, Chrome extension)

recommendations.title: Create memory/INDEX.md

Extract stable facts from daily logs into INDEX.md
Update daily logs to reference INDEX.md
